bibl.title: Who Built the Great Temples of Egypt?
bibl.note: The aim of this article is to address key issues of the mobilisation of ressources in pharaonic, and to an extent post-pharaonic Egypt, as part of a wider consideration of the degree and nature of the penetration of central government throughout the geographical and political unity of Egypt. - The King as Builder. - Public Role and Private Faith in Temple Endowment. - Middle Kingdom Provincial Governors. - Central and Local Interaction: Skilled and Unskilled Workers. - Temple Personnel and Temple Resources. - Military Organisation. - Foreign and Local Workforces. The Provision of Labourers. - Attitudes to Work and Migrant Labour.
